title: So this bug has been happening i've done all the guides and all the check ups nothing worked

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I did a fresh reinstall did everything in the guides it still seems to happen between 7-12 minutes specifically and it only happens once per game and then even if the game is 60 minutes it'll not happen so i have no idea what this is I've played league for almost a decade now and I've never had an issue now with the latest harrowing update and windows 10 update this happens and it's making me livid

replies.body: This message can come up if you've lost connection to the game server and no longer able to communication information between yourself, players, and the match.  You mentioned updating Windows 10, so I recommend disabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which was recently enabled and has been causing some crashing issues for some players.  Then go over to our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is holding strong and able to maintain comms.  Hope that helps!

Nope that's disabled i've already said i've done everything and every single one of your guides it didn't help i'm also not the only person with this issue thankfully http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/r7nvU3Z6-game-crashing-mid-match

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you.  Download our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and grab some logs to attach to your ticket for context.  We'll respond as soon as possibile.

Already did this whole procedure... i told you numerous times i did everything and every guide.. also the hextech repair tool.... it's a problem with the latest patch not any of us that are receiving this issue..
